SVGAnimatedRect.summary: The SVGAnimatedRect interface represents an attribute that can be animated.

SVGAnimatedRectBaseVal.summary: The baseVal read-only property of the interface represents the current non-animated value of the viewBox attribute of an SVG element.

remarks.para: This property reflects the SVG element's {{SVGAttr("viewBox")}} attribute value as a read-only object. It provides access to the static rectangle defined by the viewBox attribute, including the x, y, width, and height values.

SVGAnimatedRectBaseVal.value: A object representing the current non-animated value of the viewBox attribute.

SVGAnimatedRectAnimVal.summary: The animVal read-only property of the interface represents the current animated value of the viewBox attribute of an SVG element as a read-only object. It provides access to the rectangle's dynamic state, including the x, y, width, and height values during the animation.

remarks.para: If no animation is applied, the animVal property reflects the SVG element's {{SVGAttr("viewBox")}} attribute value and will be identical to .

SVGAnimatedRectAnimVal.value: A object representing the animated value of the viewBox attribute.
